product_name: Front Porch Classics Outfitters Mancala Game
long_description: Bring the Outfitters Mancala Game from Front Porch Classics on your next camping or rafting trip. It's portable, easy to learn and fun for the whole family to play. Board folds up to stow in the sturdy mesh carry bag; playing stones included. Mancala is an ancient game of strategy from Africa; 2 players take turns scooping small stones from their bowls and dropping them one at a time into other bowls. Player who collects the most stones in his or her mancala (large bowl) wins.
short_description: Bring the Outfitters Mancala Game from Front Porch Classics on your next camping or rafting trip. It's portable, easy to learn and fun for the whole family to play.
